extension.name: VehicleManager New Vehicle Extended free
extension.author: OrdaSoft - Andrey Kvasnevskiy
extension.description:
Displays the newest vehicle from VehicleManager.
Added the posssibility to choose the number of vehicle to display, limit the number of words to show from the vehicle description, show/hide the vehicle title.

param.name: count
param.label: Item Count
param.description: The number of Vehicles to display

param.name: words
param.label: Description Words Count
param.description: Word limit for Vehicle description. Zero means no description, blank means no limit

param.name: sortnewby
param.label: Sort New Title By
param.description: Define what is a new title

param.name: showtitle
param.label: Show Title
param.description: Show or hide the Vehicle Title

param.name: showdescription
param.label: Show Description
param.description: Show or hide the Vehicle Description

param.name: showimage
param.label: Show Image
param.description: Show or hide the Vehicle Image

param.name: imagesize
param.label: Image Height
param.description: Set the height of the Image (width will auto work out by keeping ratio)
